mapper.select: SELECT RENTAL_CODE, PERFO_TITLE, GENRE_NAME, DIRECTOR, CAST, PERFO_CONTENT, RUNNING_TIME, AGE_LIMIT,PERFO_STATUS, PRICE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM PERFORMANCE P JOIN RENTAPPLICATION R USING(RENTAL_CODE) GROUP BY RENTAL_CODE, PERFO_TITLE, GENRE_NAME, DIRECTOR, CAST, PERFO_CONTENT, RUNNING_TIME, AGE_LIMIT,PERFO_STATUS, PRICE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME

SELECT RENTAL_CODE, PERFO_TITLE, GENRE_NAME, DIRECTOR, CAST, PERFO_CONTENT, RUNNING_TIME, AGE_LIMIT, PRICE,PERFO_STATUS, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, EVENT_DATE, EVENT_TIME, HALL_NAME FROM PERFORMANCE P JOIN RENTAPPLICATION R USING(RENTAL_CODE) GROUP BY RENTAL_CODE, PERFO_TITLE, GENRE_NAME, DIRECTOR, CAST, PERFO_CONTENT, RUNNING_TIME, AGE_LIMIT, PRICE,PERFO_STATUS, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, EVENT_DATE, EVENT_TIME, HALL_NAME HAVING RENTAL_CODE=#{rno} ORDER BY RENTAL_CODE

SELECT RENTAL_CODE, PERFO_TITLE, GENRE_NAME, DIRECTOR,AGENT_NAME,AGENT_PHONE,AGENT_EMAIL , PERFO_STATUS, PRICE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, HALL_NAME, EVENT_TIME,EVENT_DATE FROM PERFORMANCE JOIN RENTAPPLICATION USING(RENTAL_CODE) GROUP BY RENTAL_CODE, PERFO_TITLE, GENRE_NAME, DIRECTOR,AGENT_NAME,AGENT_PHONE,AGENT_EMAIL, HALL_NAME, EVENT_TIME,EVENT_DATE , PERFO_STATUS, PRICE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME ORDER BY RENTAL_CODE
